    • Method Detail

      • member

        Member member(int id)
        Returns a member by member identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique member identifier.
        Returns:
        The member or null if the member does not exist.

      • members

        List<Member> members()
        Returns an immutable set of all cluster members.
        Returns:
        An immutable set of all members in the cluster.

        Returns the cluster serializer.
        Returns:

      • addListener

        Members addListener(MembershipListener listener)
        Adds a membership listener to the cluster.

        Parameters:
        listener - The membership event listener to add.
        Returns:
        The cluster.

      • removeListener

        Members removeListener(MembershipListener listener)
        Removes a membership listener from the cluster.
        Parameters:
        listener - The membership event listener to remove.
        Returns:
        The cluster.
